review:
four friends takes refuge in the house of an old blind couple to get away from a loan shark, things get complicated when the old couple mistakes one of them as their grandson plus another's voice as him!
unaware of the fact that a funny yet dangerous smuggler is trying to retrieve something from the old couple they managed to live in the house carefree while the same time all of them trying to woo their gorgeous neighbour!
one of the paisa vasool movie of the hindi cinema.
rohit shetty after the failure of his debut movie 'zameen' which was also a good and paisa vasool movie, tried his luck in comedy and nailed it.
this movie has some memorable characters like gopal, madhav, goonga lucky, laxman and ofcourse vasooli bhai played by mukesh tiwari.
it is a must watch comedy with a pinch of action( you know rohit shetty's style! he likes to see the cars flying in the sky).

amazing comedy drama movie. actors acting is real good. specially paresh sirs acting is superb he was looking like a real blind old man wearing black glasses . storyline direction is superb. golmaal one is good but now a days golmaal series are not good only jokery is there a lot sorry to say that rohit sir but as a audience i am saying that to you. otherwise its a nice movie.
